posts.program: Speech And Hearing Bioscience And Technology (SHBT), PhD (F19)

posts.result: Wait listed via Website on 1 Mar 2019
posts.comments: If anybody feels like they may not accept their offer at this school, or if anybody has got in from the waitlist in previous academic years, can you please leave a comment here? It would really be helpful to my decision. Thanks in advance!

posts.result: Accepted via Website on 27 Feb 2019 Undergrad GPA: 3.90GRE General (V/Q/W): 164/167/5.00GRE Subject: n/a♦
posts.comments: Received my official acceptance on Feb 27th, during my visit to campus :) Update on March 8th that I received the Presidential Scholarship on top of the full funding package already offered! Super excited!
FYI : some wondered about the statistics. 86 admitted out of 1000-1100 applicants. No wait list apparently.

perfect scores in the master's degree. No research papers. Didn't submit my toefl on time.

Good luck :')
